Name: HeapVR
About the game: HeapVR is a block stacking experience with two game modes. 1st Game Mode: Stack blocks into a tower as high as you can while floating blocks attempt to interrupt your progress in a reverse Jenga-like game. 2nd Game Mode (Coming Soon): Casually snap blocks together in free-play to build any 3D structure you can imagine.
Developers: Richard Fox - Development,John Gibbons - Development,Jonathan Haggard - Design,Joe Cantasano - Sound/Audio
